item.title: The practice of recruiting and retaining skilled individuals
item.description:
Innovative talent acquisition strategies are helping some companies secure the best possible candidates. Mei-lynn Chan, Head of Organizational Development, Group Human Capital at Maybank, emphasizes the need for HR departments to approach hiring from a business perspective. This involves quantifying HR activities into tangible business metrics. She argues that while budget constraints may have traditionally limited HR’s hiring choices, a new perspective allows for hiring the right talent if the business can absorb the cost until the hire generates a return on investment...
